extendedInfo.description: Text tool is the all in one SMS text message app bringing together all the tools you will ever need. Delayed text message sending, SMS text message forwarder, SMS text message responder and encrypted text message sender all in one handy app.Want to send an SMS delayed text message in an hour?, tomorrow at 12.00 or at a specific date and time?, Text Tool can do it. Want to forward all your text messages to another number, and still know where they came from originally, Text Tool can do it.Want to automatically reply to SMS text messages that come to you because you are in a meeting or driving, Text Tool can do it.Want to send an encrypted SMS text message with a delay or straight away using AES encryption, Text Tool can do it.Features include...1) MultiText support to 459 characters2) Search your contacts or input number directly3) Message counter to gauge cost per message4) Message sent notification5) Integrated message control (dumps sent messages from Text Tool into standard message outbox) so you can see it in your normal SMS app6) No running services, so no excessive power consumption.7) No holding the phone awake.8) Turn your phone off and on and message will still send.10) Pin point accuracy to time and date set if in signal regardless of whether phone is sleeping or not..11) Edit stored messages.12) Multi Contact support.13) Multi number support for contacts with more than one number.14) Repeat function.15) Message reply tool, to send an auto reply to an incoming message. (phone must be switched on)16) Message forward, to forward your messages on to another phone. (phone must be switched on)17) Click the padlock to encrypt your text messages, when someone else has Text Tool installed, you can decypt the SMS text message to read it.18) Have your encrypted SMS text messages, hidden from the normal message cue, choose this setting to run in stealth mode and stop your incomming text messages being seen by other text message apps.19) Set lights, sound and vibrate of outgoing and incoming texts.20) No limit on amount of multipart texts you can send (updated message counter to show number of texts you will pay for).4 apps in one, message delay, message reply, message forward, encrypted SMS text message.Tested on HTC desire, desire HD, wildfire, hero , moto droid, samsung galaxy s, X10, emulators....COMING SOON....More tools........
